She plans on reinvesting her extra income due to the loan back into her business, as well as setting aside some of it to buy a new plot of land for growing clover.

loans.use: buy additional livestock and pay rent for some of her farmland

loans.name: Debyanti

texts.en:
Debyanti is a 27-year-old woman who is married to Dedy, a 32-year-old man. They have been blessed with a 6-year-old boy who is attending the first grade of elementary school. 

Since they got married, Debyanti has been running a small scale business of door-to-door beauty salon. She operates the business based on the customer’s request and does it directly at their home. Debyanti offers some treatment like  hair cream bath, hair styling, and hair mask, and even does hair straightening. Even though the business is still small, she already has some regular customers for monthly treatment. 

Recently, Debyanti has been quite busy as the demand of hair straightening is increasing from her customers. However she could not serve them all because of the limited amount of hair care products she has. This situation leads her to apply for a loan amounting of IDR 3,000,000 from TLM. 

This loan will be a problem solver as it enables her to purchase those things she needs: i.e., hair straightening products in bulk, shampoo, conditioner, etc. She is hoping that the business will be running well, and thus she can realize her dream of having a business place one day.

loans.use: to purchase those things she needs: i.e., hair straightening products in bulk, shampoo, conditioner, etc.

loans.name: Mayder Santiago

texts.es:
Mayder es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, tiene 21 años y vive en Ica junto a su familia.
Está estudiando una carrera ya que quiere convertirse en un gran profesional y así pueda brindar un mejor futuro a sus seres queridos, también para poder cubrir sus gastos de estudios está trabajando como vigilante en una empresa. Es una persona muy responsable, con mucha iniciativa, buen hijo, todo un ejemplo para sus hermanos.
Mayder quiere iniciar un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, es por ello que piensa utilizar el crédito para poder comprar mercadería (ropa al por mayor). Él está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad porque con esto empezará a crecer como empresario y más adelante podrá ampliar su negocio e innovar en otros rubros.
texts.en:
Mayder is a young man with a great desire to be successful. He is 21 years old and lives in Ica with his family. He is studying in the university and he wants to be a successful professional so that he can provide a better future for his loved ones. He also wants to be able to cover the costs of his college education so he is working as a security guard in a business. He is a very responsible person with a lot of initiative. He is a good son and a good example for his siblings.

Mayder wants to start a small clothing business, so he is seeking a loan to be able to buy clothing at wholesale. He is thankful to the Kiva lenders for their generosity because with this loan he will start to grow as a businessman and in the future be able to expand his business and innovate in other fields as well.

loans.use: to buy clothing at wholesale to start his own business.

loans.name: Jasarys Julia

texts.es:
Jasarys Julia a su corta edad de tan solo 24 años, es una persona activa, creativa, impulsa el desarrollo económico en su municipio con su negocio de Cosméticos que es su único ingreso, es soltera, no tiene hijos, trabaja para sus gastos personales y asumir sus obligaciones, le gusta tener lo propio, necesita este crédito para invertirlo en comprar nuevas líneas de cosméticos como oriflan, Arabela, Vogue, ahora ella solo trabaja con Zermat y Avon, por la demanda de sus clientes que le solicita productos de estas otras marcas está obligada a abastecer a su clientela y no cuenta con el disponible para realizar la compra y darle total cobertura, solo sera posible con este crédito, lo cual también beneficiaria a su familia mejorando sus ingresos y su nivel de vida.
 
la actividad principal de esta zona es el comercio, siendo de gran ventaja para su negocio, pues la gente invierte en el cuido, presentación y salud.

Esta actividad le permitirá en un futuro construir su propia vivienda que pretende ajustar con un próximo crédito si Dios le permite ampliarse en el mercado del Comercio, seria para ella un sueño hecho realidad.
texts.en:
Jasarys Julia, at the young age of 24, is an active and creative person who drives economic development in her community with her cosmetics business, which is her sole source of income. She is single with no children and works to cover her personal expenses and to meet her obligations. She enjoys having what she needs.

She needs this loan in order to invest it in the purchase of new lines of cosmetics like Oriflan, Arabela and Vogue. Currently she only works with Zermat and Avon. Due to her clients requests for products from these other brands, she needs to supply them for her customers. She does not have the necessary funds to purchase and give her customers this coverage. It will only be possible with this loan, which will also benefit her family by increasing their income and standard of living.

The principal activity in this area is business, which is a great advantage for her business since people invest a lot in personal care, presentation and health.

This activity will allow her, in the future, to build her own home which she hopes to adapt with a future loan. If God allows her to expand in the retail market, it would be a dream come true for her.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics from the Arabela, Vogue and Oriflan collections among others, since this is her means of making a living.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Elena works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from electronic mobile load retailing. Elena is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional items to sell in her general store.

Elena has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Loikjon

texts.en:
Loikjon comes from a rural area. He was born in the year 1985. He is married and has three children. His children are non-adults. 

He is a repeat client of IMON. He is an honest person and has a good credit history. He has been busy servicing for more than seven years. He repairs tractors and cars, and he also rents out a tractor to local farmers. 

Loikjon little by little attracts more clients. He works hard but it is still not enough to improve his living conditions. Loikjon is asking for a loan of 3,200 TJS to repair his tractor as his tractor has broken. This loan will help him to continue business activity. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To repair his tractor

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is thankful that she was granted a 15,000 PHP loan, which she used to buy supplies and other materials needed in her doormat-making business. Through her earnings, she is able to support her family and meet their daily basic needs. 

She would like to apply for a PHP 15,000 loan, which she will use to buy more fabric, cloth, thread and other materials needed in her tailoring business. Demands for clothing, like uniforms and such, are available all year round. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given to her. Her income will sustain her everyday needs and the school needs of her children.

Arlene hopes to be able to grow her business. She dreams of giving her family a good future through all her hard work. She prays for a strong faith in the Lord. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, and other items needed for her business.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 34 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Jocelyn has borrowed and paid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Marjorie

texts.en:
Marjorie works hard to support her family. She has a live-in partner and has a direct-selling personal products business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years now.

She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more products from personal collection to sell. In the future, Marjorie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more personal products to sell

loans.name: Vicent

texts.en:
Vicent, 26 years old,  deals in the maize trade and has a piggery. He began the business to earn income to take care of family needs.

 He will use the loan to buy more maize to sell. He hopes to build a good home for himself. His challenge is lack of transport for his goods, where he is forced to transport the maize on bicycles or motorcycles which are inadequate.

 He is  working hard to afford a cheap pick up to transport the corn. He appreciates the support.

loans.use: To buy corn to sell

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is a widow and works hard to support her family. For the past two years, she has operated a business selling household products in the Philippines.

Rebecca is requesting a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell to her customers. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business in order to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy more household products to sell to her customers

loans.name: Qurbon

texts.ru: Курбон выходец из района Хамадони. Ему 52 года. Он отец троих детей. Его жена продавщица и занимается продажей продуктов. Сам Курбон имеет высшее образование. Он в течение 10 лет работает бухгалтером в государственном учреждении. Единственный сын Курбона учится в ВУЗе. Он студент третьего курса Таджикского Национального Университета. Сын Курбона учится хорошо, он тоже как отец хочет быть образованным и работать в государтсвенном учреждении. Однако за третий год его обучения в ВУЗе родители еще не оплатили. У них сейчас нет финансовой возможности и единственное решение они видят в получении кредита. Курбон надеется на этот кредит, так как хочет чтобы его сын успешно окончил ВУЗ.
texts.en: Qurbon is a native of the Hamadoni region of Tajikistan.  He is 52, and a father of three children.  His wife is a grocery store clerk, while Qurbon has a university education and has worked as an accountant with the government for the past 10 years.  His only son is a student in his third year at Tajik National University, and is getting along well in his studies.  His son wants to be an educated civil servant just like his father; however, Qurbon and his wife have yet to pay for their son's third year of study.  They don't have the money to do so at the moment, and see this loan as their only solution.  Qurbon is counting on this loan so his son can continue to do well in school and eventually graduate.

loans.use: pay tuition for his son's third year of college

loans.name: Oscar Sigfredo

texts.es: Oscar de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cinco hijos y su esposa, trabaja como jornal en un rancho que se encuentra ubicado cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de la casa, el quiere mejorar si vivienda construyendo un cuarto en el lugar que muestra la fotografía, por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de arena, cemento, ladrillos, hierro, laminas, puertas, polines y pago de mano de obra, para que el y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Oscar is 38 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and five children. He works as a day laborer on a ranch that is located near his home. He manages to pay some of the household expenses with what he earns. 

He would like to upgrade his housing by building a room on the spot indicated in the photo. That is why he is requesting a loan to buy sand, cement, bricks, rebar, sheet metal, doors, roof joists and pay for labor, so he and his family can live more comfortably and safely.

loans.use: To buy sand, cement, bricks, rebar, sheet metal, doors, roof joists and pay for labor

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business selling mobile phones and laptops.

loans.name: Misael Antonio

texts.es: Misael de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hija, el posee una pequeña tienda desde hace 15 años ubicada en su lugar de residencia vende una variedad de productos como golosinas, huevos, sopas,  refrescos, granos básicos, gelatinas, azúcar, etc. y tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así podrá tener mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Misael, who is 44 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and their daughter. He has had a little store located in his residence for 15 years. He sells a variety of products, such as candies, eggs, soups, soft drinks, basic grains, gelatins, sugar, etc., and he has many customers because of his good prices. He is applying for a loan to purchase more merchandise wholesale, since this is his only source of income, and thus he will be able to have better earnings for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy candies, eggs, soups, soft drinks, basic grains, gelatins, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan works hard to support her family. She is married and has an electronic mobile load retailing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for four years now.

Joan requested an 11,000 PHP  loan through NWTF to purchase an additional amount of electronic mobile load to sell to her customers.

In the future, Joan would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase an additional amount of eletronic mobile load to sell to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 44 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising cattle in the Philippines. Carmelita is borrowing 18,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase vitamins and other supplies for her cattle.

Carmelita has been raising cattle for 20 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling charcoal.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins and other supplies for her cattle

loans.name: Arman

texts.en:
Arman, 32, lives with his big family in the frontier village of Zangakatun in the Ararat region. He was born in Zangakatun and likes his small and cute village very much, in spite of the unsafe conditions and hard peasant life he endures. Arman is proud that his village is the birthplace of one of Armenia's most famous and talented writers. 

Arman, his wife, and his mother are engaged in farming and agriculture. On his farm, he is raising four cows and six calves. His mother and wife sell a wide range of dairy products from the farm, including milk, macun (the national dairy product), butter, and cheese. Arman meticulously feeds and cleans the cattle.

In addition to operating a farm, Arman works as a driver. Arman also sells produce from his orchard. The orchard, which Arman's father planted, provides a bountiful harvest of apples, peaches, plums, and nuts.

Arman is requesting a loan of 500,000 Armenian drams to repair his barn for the coming winter so that it stays warm.  He will also buy some fodder for the upcoming long winter.

loans.use: to repair his cattle barn and buy some fodder

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 39 years old and married with one child.

Rowena works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell.

Rowena has borrowed and paid one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Rowena aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en:
To be young and starting a new family with a fragment of land is a challenge for people in the Nkubu area of Kenya. Pauline, the mother of two, has overcome this challenge, and has been practicing mixed farming for the past five years. Her primary source of income has been selling eggs, vegetables, and milk, and some personal business she engages in to supplement her meager income. 

Pauline, who is an ever-smiling farmer, has defied the common thinking of most Kenyans that farming is for the older generation. She passionately loves dairy farming, and taking care of her cows gives her great joy. She is an early riser and she wakes up every day in the morning to go and milk her cow. Through her dairy cow, she is able to get between 10-15 liters a day, and this helps her support her family. 

Pauline also practices crop farming, but she has not been making good profits because of poor farming implements. That is why she is kindly seeking a loan to buy farm implements. Through the loan, she will be able to buy high-quality seeds, good fertilizer, and pesticides that she will use to greatly improve her crop production. Modern farming requires the use of modern techniques, and therefore using high-quality seeds will assure her of a bumper harvest and hence, increased profit levels. 

Pauline is very visionary, and her goal for the season is to boost her crop production and be able to get more crop output than the previous year. All this can be achieved through lenders’ help and goodwill. Pauline believes that through the loan, she will turn around her family life and be able to give her child a solid educational background. This loan will be Pauline’s way out of poverty.

loans.use: to buy farm implements, high-quality seeds, good fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Oscar Atilio

texts.es:
Oscar de 28 años de edad, proviene de una familia trabajadora, estudió hasta noveno año de secundaria, está felizmente casado y tiene dos hijos a los que quiere mucho, su esposa se dedica a la venta de productos de revista. 

Oscar tiene un puesto de venta de agua de coco en su comunidad, lleva ya 4 años en dicho puesto y gracias al esfuerzo diario y la confianza en Dios logra obtener buenos ingresos, también vende frutas y verduras. Anteriormente,  trabajó en una gasolinera cercana a su comunidad pero pensó que al independizarse le iría mejor.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar un vehículo con el que pueda transportar los cocos de una forma más eficiente y en más cantidad, así también con las frutas y verduras, de esta manera ahorraría tiempo y tendría la oportunidad de ampliar su negocio y obtener mayores ingresos.

El sueño que tiene a futuro es llegar a comprar un terreno y construir su casita, para vivir junto con su esposa y sus hijos, pues donde viven actualmente le pertenece a la suegra y él sueña con vivir en lo propio.
texts.en:
Oscar, who is 28 years old, comes from a hard-working family. He went to school through the ninth grade of secondary school. He is happily married and has two children whom he loves very much. His wife sells catalog products.

Oscar has a stand in his community where he sells coconut water. He has already had this stand for four years, and thanks to his daily effort and confidence in God, he manages to obtain good income. He also sells fruits and vegetables. In the past, he worked in a gas station near his community, but he thought that it would be better for him to be independent.

The loan that he is applying for is to buy a vehicle with which he can transport coconuts more efficiently and in greater quantity, as well as fruits and vegetables. In this way he would save time and would have the opportunity to expand his business and obtain greater income.

The dream that he has for the future is to manage to buy a plot of land and construct his little house, to live there with his wife and their children, since the place where they live now belongs to his mother-in-law, and he dreams of living in his own place.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle with which he can transport coconuts more efficiently and in greater quantity.

loans.name: Carlos Alfredo

texts.es:
Carlos de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta 2ª año de bachillerato. Actualmente esta casado y a procreado una hija.

Carlos se dedica la criá de pollos de engorde desde hace 3 años, este negocio lo tiene en su casa, también se dedica a la agricultura y a la siembra de maíz y frijol.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar lamina y madera, para mejorar las instalaciones de la granja, como lo es el techo

Su deseo es que su negocio crezca y que tenga mas ingresos, para él y su familia.
texts.en: Carlos is 28 years old and completed her second year of high school. Today she is married and has a daughter. Carlos has had a business raising and fattening chickens for 3 years. The business is located at his home. He also farms, growing corn and beans. The loan he seeks from CREDICAMPO is to buy laminate and wood to make improvements to the farm, specifically the roof. His wish is that his business grows and has more income for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy laminate and wood to make improvements to the farm, specifically the roof.

loans.name: Raul Orlando

texts.es: Raul de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el trabaja como contratista de proyectos de construcción de casas desde hace 15 años, experiencia que le ha dado la oportunidad de tener muchos clientes, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de herramientas como palas, piochas,  carretilla, etc. y reparación de maquinaria que utiliza para pintar, ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así poder tener una mejora calidad de vida.
texts.en: Raul, who is 42 years old, lives in his own house with his life companion and their two children. He has worked as a contractor for house construction projects for 15 years. His experience has given him the opportunity to have many customers. He is applying for a loan to buy tools such as shovels, pickaxes, a wheelbarrow, etc., and to repair the machinery that he uses to paint, since this is his only source of work, and thus he will be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tools such as shovels, pickaxes, a wheelbarrow, etc., and repair the machinery that he uses to paint.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add money float to her mobile money transfer business.

loans.name: Munira

texts.en: Munira is a hardworking woman from North Tajikistan. She is married. Her father is Nizomiddin. Munira has two children. She has been busy with animal husbandry for more than 10 years. Munira also works in a local school. She mainly feeds cows. Munira buys cows, feeds them for some months and sells them in a local market. She manages with that business alone. Munira works hard to earn a living. She is going to increase her working capital and in this way improve her business. She is asking for a loan of 5100 Somoni to buy two cows. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy two cows to increase her working capital.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy improved seed, barbed wire, and pay for labor to establish a field and guarantee food to her herd of cattle which is her source of income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Do the paperwork to acquire her college degree in Chemical Engineering

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 50 years old and married with ten children.

Nenita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like candies, biscuits, sugar, snack foods, soft drinks, beer, etc. to sell.

Nenita has borrowed and paid back 22 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from buying and selling vegetables.

Nenita aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like candies, biscuits, sugar, snack foods, soft drinks, beer, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Marta de 37 años de edad  es madre soltera vive en casa propia con hija y su madre, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia en una zona muy transitada tiene muchos clientes fijos por la calidad de la ropa y los buenos precios, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la comprar de mas ropa por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi poder tener mejore ingresos.
texts.en: Marta is a 37 year old single mother who lives in her own home with her daughter and mother. She has a business selling used clothing. Her business is located in her home, in an area that is highly frequented so she has many regular customers for the quality of the clothing and the good prices. She seeks a loan to buy more clothing at wholesale in order to be able to continue with her sales and thus be able to have greater income.

loans.use: to buy clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Jose Alejandro

texts.es: Jose de 61 años de edad desde hace 20 años se dedica a la crianza de ganado de repasto en la zona donde reside, tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes, vive solo en casa propia, ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de su ganado ya que de eso depende su negocio, por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas y la compra de mas ganado que le permita crecer en el negocio y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: For 20 years, Jose, who is 61 years old, has raised pastured cattle in the zone where he lives. He has very good clientele, since he has known how to win the confidence of his customers. He lives alone in his own house. He has decided to invest in the care of his livestock, since his business depends on this. For this reason, he has applied for a loan to be able to buy vitamins and purchase more livestock, which will allow him to grow in his business and thus have better income.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and more livestock

loans.name: Transito

texts.es: Transito de 45  años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Transito, who is 45 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her two children. For a number of years she has made and sold tortillas. Her business is located in her place of residence, and she has many customers. She is applying for a loan to purchase corn by the quintal (approximately 100 lbs) and lime in order to be able to continue making tortillas and thus be able to have better income to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal and lime

loans.name: Valentina

texts.en:
Valentina sends you her thanks for your generosity, because her previous loan has improved her business. She was able to buy spare parts and accessories for their vehicle. The loan also helped her provide for their daily needs and expenditures.

She is very positive that she could improve more her business if you will lend her 30,000 PHP. This new loan will go to additional supplies of accessories and spare parts of their van. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family if the unit is regularly maintained and in good condition.

Valentina hopes she could buy another van. She dreams of giving her family a better future. She meets every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and for the maintenance of her van.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en: Caroline has a retail shop and has been running this business for seven years and it has been profitable. She is 27 years old, single and has two children. She will use this loan to buy more stock of sugar, sweets, tissue paper, soap and washing detergents to sell. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for her children. This is her first loan term from VisionFund Kenya and in the future her hopes are to expand her business and be prosperous.

loans.use: to buy more retail goods to sell.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Annabelle is 52 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Annabelle is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Annabelle has been farming rice for eight years and also earns additional income from food vending and pig fattening.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Juliana

texts.en:
Juliana is 54 years old and has nine children. She is widowed and has four children who are still in school.

Juliana is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Juliana requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Juliana has been in the pig fattening business for five years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Juliana would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy poultry

loans.name: Maria Irma

texts.es: Maria de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija quien le ayuda en el negocio, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa interior y zapatos para niños desde hace 15 años, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad de sus productos, Maria está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor para poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenos ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria is 59 years old and lives in her own home with her daughter, who helps her with the business. 

She has been selling underwear and children's shoes for 15 years. She has many customers thanks to the quality of her products. 

Maria is requesting a loan to buy more wholesale merchandise, so she can continue her work, which generates a good income for her.

loans.use: To buy underwear and children's shoes.

loans.name: Vilma America

texts.es: Vilma de 36 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su madre y su hija, ella trabaja como empleada en una empresa privada, Vilma quiere mejor su vivienda cambiando el techo ya que se encuentra muy deteriorado, pero con lo que obtiene en su trabajo no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para comprar laminas, polines y pago de mano de obra y asi ella y su familia puedan vivir mas seguros.
texts.en:
Vilma is a 36-year-old single mother. She lives in her own home along with her mother and her daughter. Vilma works as an employee at a private company.

She wants to improve her home by replacing the roof that has severely deteriorated. However, the amount she earns from her work is not enough to cover this project. For this reason, she is requesting a loan in order to buy metal sheets, beams, as well as pay for labor. As a result, she and her family can live more securely.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets, beams, and pay for labor in order to replace the roof of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to add to her stock of clothes and cereals.

loans.name: Jasmine

texts.en:
Jasmine is 31 years old and married with two children.

Jasmine works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like feed, snack foods, candies, biscuits, coffee, sugar, soft drinks, etc. to sell.

Jasmine has borrowed and paid back three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.

Jasmine aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like feed, snack foods, candies, biscuits, coffee, sugar, soft drinks, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena is married. For the past three years, she has run a food vending business in the Philippines. Lorena works hard to support her family. 

Lorena is requesting a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients and supples for her food vending business. Her goal is to save enough money to provide her family with a secure future.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and supplies for her food vending business

loans.name: Ritchel

texts.en:
Ritchel is 48 years old and married with two children.

Ritchel is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase vaccines, feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Ritchel has been raising pigs for 20 years now, and has borrowed 8 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Ritchel would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase vaccines, feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es: Amelia de 65 años de edad vive en casa propia con su nieto, ella se dedica a la venta de ganchos para el cabello su pequeño negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos de los gastos de su hogar, Amelia solicita crédito para poder comprar mas mercadería para obtener mejores ganancias y tener junto con su nieto una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Amelia, who is 65 years old, lives in her own house with her grandson. She sells hair clips. Her little business is located in her place of residence. With the earnings that she obtains, she manages to pay some of the expenses of her household. Amelia is applying for a loan to be able to buy more merchandise in order to obtain better earnings and have a better quality of life with her grandson.

loans.use: to buy hair clips wholesale.

loans.name: Heghine

texts.en:
Heghine sends her warmest greetings to all the Kiva lenders and greatly wants to continue her partnership with Kiva and Nor Horizon. This will be already her third Kiva loan. This pretty lady is 28 years old and she lives with her mother in the village of Tsovagyugh, which is in the Gegharkunik region. Her mother being unemployed is engaged in farming and perfectly manages it. Her father still works in the Russian Federation from where he transfers money for his family. Heghine is a very kind and intellectual person with a higher education and a specialty of pedagogue. She still studies and simultaneously works at the school. She studies at the paid division of the State Pedagogical University of Armenia to receive her master's degree to have higher qualification in her profession.
 
This time she will also be more than happy and thankful if she receives this loan amount in order again to pay her tuition fee.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fee

loans.name: Pedro Alejandrino

texts.es: Pedro de 69 años de edad se dedica desde hace 45 años a la agricultura siembra maíz, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su esposa en casa propia, Don Pedro está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Pedro, who is 69 years old, has worked in agriculture for 45 years. He raises corn. He sells his products in the various markets that are near his home. He lives with his wife in their own house. Don Pedro is applying for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, etc., to be able to continue with his work and have better income and a better quality of life along with his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, etc.

loans.name: Reina Margarita

texts.es: Reina de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella elabora antojitos como: papas fritas, yuca frita, empanadas, etc. que vende de forma ambulante cerca de su lugar de residencia, Reina solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL  para la compra de productos que utiliza en la elaboración de sus antojitos como: aceite, papas, plátanos, yuca y todo los ingredientes para su elaboración y poder solventar los gastos que se le pueden presentar.
texts.en:
Reina is 59 years old and lives in her own home along with her family. She makes street food such as potato chips, fried cassava, empanadas, and other items. Reina sells as a street vendor near her home.

She is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral in order to buy products that she uses for preparing street food such as oil, potatoes, plantains, cassava, and other ingredients. As a result, she can cover expenses whenever they come up.

loans.use: to buy oil, potatoes, plantains, cassava, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en:
Tabitha is a 42-year-old hardworking woman married to Barnabas who adds additional income to support their family. They are blessed with five children.  Tabitha has been operating a retail business shop for a period of 10 years, earning an income of KES 15,000 at the end of every month.

Tabitha is now taking her second loan of KES 30,000 with VisionFund Kenya and intends to buy sugar, rice, wheat flour, maize flour, cooking fat and detergents.

Tabitha plans to use the anticipated income to pay school fees for her children and hopes to become a successful businesswoman with a bright future.

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice, wheat flour, maize flour, cooking fat and detergents.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 57 years old and married. She has eight children, four of whom are currently in school.

For the past eight years, Marcelina has been in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Marcelina is requesting a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. She has previously serviced nine loans from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Marcelina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
De 38 años de edad, cuenta con 3 hijos: el primero es de 9 años de edad y es estudiante de su comunidad, el segundo  de 6 años de edad  es también estudiante y el tercero de 2 años de edad que aun no estudia, los hijos se ha convertido en el propósito principal para Antonia para superar en la vida y darles una mejor vida e condición de vida.

Su actividad productiva la cual le genera ganancia en su sistema económica es la compra y venta de ropa típica en su comunidad ya que es la única forma que ella a podido encontrar para poder tener ingresos económicos para su familia, su segunda actividad es servir de mesera en un café y por medio de esa actividad ella puede tener otro ingreso extra para poder mantener a su familia y darles una condición de vida apropiada  para sus hijos y que sean buenos profesionales en el campo laboral de la vida.

Ella es muy emprendedora en la vida y es por ello que ella se decidió a la realización de un préstamo para la compra de mercadería de ropa típica, para tener a la disposición de la clientela más mercadería para su respectiva venta.

La aspiración más importante de ella es la construcción de una mejor vivienda y darles un buen estudio a sus hijos para que ellos sean profesionales  en un futuro.
texts.en:
Antonia is 38 years old, and has 3 dependent children. The first is 9 years old, and is a student in the community. The second is 6 years old and is also a student, and the third is 2 years old, and does not got to school yet. These children have become the main purpose for Antonia to get ahead in life, to give them a better life and living conditions.

Her productive activity that generates an income in her financial system, is the buying and selling of common clothing in her community. This is the only activity that she has been able to find in order to have a financial income for her family, her other activity is serving as a waitress at a café. Through this job, she is able to have an extra income in order to maintain her family and provide appropriate living conditions for her children so they can be good professionals in life's workforce.

Antonia is very entrepreneurial in life, and it is because of this that she decided to request a loan to buy inventory of common clothing in order to have more inventory available for the customers at each sale.

Her most important aspiration is to build a better house, and give her children a good education so they can be professionals in the future.

loans.use: to buy inventory of common clothing.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
This is Florencia. She sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan has enriched her business. She was able to purchase additional grocery products that are needed to increase her inventory. The loan also helped her provide for her daily needs.

She is very positive that she could improve her business more if you would lend her 30,000 PHP. This new loan will go for additional groceries, toiletries, and beverages. Her customers will be likely to buy more items if she has more of her products displayed in her store. An increase in sales will also result in a significant increase in profit, which will also result in her business becoming viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family.

Florencia desires to expand her business in the coming years. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Luz America

texts.es: Doña Luz de 65 años de edad posee desde hace varios años un bazar ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos que comercializa, vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de más juguetes y ropa para continuar con sus ventas.
texts.en:
Doña Luz is 65 years old and has been managing a bazaar out of her home for several years. She has many customers because of the variety of products that she sells. Luz lives in her own home along with her husband.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy more toys and clothes so that she can continue sales.

loans.use: to buy more toys and clothes to sell.

loans.name: Jorgia

texts.en:
Jorgia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines.

Jorgia requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy spare parts, tools and gasoline for her motorcycle.

She has been in this business for four years now.

Jorgia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts, tools and gasoline for her motorcycle

loans.name: Vannak

texts.en:
Vannak, 20, is a single young man who lives in Siem Reap Province. He earns a living by working for a travel company.  

This is his first loan with Kiva's partner, VisionFund. He will spend his entire loan to pay his school fees. Vannak is enrolled in university and is majoring in English. He hopes that he can get a good job after he graduate.

loans.use: to pay his school fees

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Soni kom District

loans.name: Tening's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  est créé  le 02 Décembre 2002  au jour de l’inauguration du banc villageois. Il est composé de   femmes très attachées au culte du travail, elles jouissent d’une très bonne expérience dans le système des bancs villageois. Elles sont toutes issues du même Village. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce et pratiquent aussi l’agriculture sous pluie.

Madame Tening  (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main droite levée) est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est âgée de 38 ans et mère de 02 filles. C’est une femme très engagée dans le développement de banc villageois. Elle s’active dans la vente de denrées alimentaires qu’elle achète en gros et demi gros pour la revente dans son village et les marchés hebdomadaires environnants. Elle a une bonne maîtrise de cette activité pour l’avoir fait pendant plus de 07 ans.

Avec son nouveau prêt elle prévoit d’acheter : 03 sacs de riz pour 37 500 F CFA, 4 cartons de divers cigarette à 60 000 F CFA, 05 paquets de thé vert, 03 sacs de sucre de 50 kg et divers biscuits et bonbons pour la revente au détail. 

Les bénéfices lui serviront de participer significativement aux frais scolaire de ses enfants d’une part et d’autre part accroître son cheptel de moutons.
texts.en:
The group was created on December 2, 2002—the same day that the banc villageois was launched. It is comprised of women who are attached to their work and who have had a very positive experience in the banc villageois system. They are all from the same village. Their main activity is small business, but they also engage in rainfed agriculture.

Madame Tening  (seated at right with her right hand raised) is the star borrower of the group. She is 38 years old and has two daughters. She is very involved in the development of the banc villageois. She sells food staples that she buys wholesale and resells both in her village and at the local weekly markets. She is an expert in this business as she has been doing it for seven years.

With her new loan, she would like to buy: three bags of rice for 37,500 FCFA, four cartons of various types of cigarettes for 60,000 FCFA, five packages of green tea, three 50kg bags of sugar, and various cookies and candies that she will sell for retail prices. 

The profits will be a significant help with her children's tuition fees. They will also help her grow her flock of sheep.

loans.use: buy three bags of rice for 37,500 FCFA, four cartons of various types of cigarettes for 60,000 FCFA, five packages of green tea, three 50kg bags of sugar, and various cookies.

loans.name: Noemy Morena

texts.es: Noemy  tiene 50 años de edad y vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella posee desde hace 10 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Noemy is 50 years old, and lives in her own home with her husband. She has had a small store located in her home for 10 years. She has many customers due to good prices and the friendliness she has when selling. She is requesting a loan to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, drinks, candies, sweet bread, etc. This way she can have better revenues for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, drinks, candies, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a married mother of three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over 20 years, she has operated an open air food selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business. 

With the Kes 30,000, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat

loans.name: Miray

texts.en:
A 35-year-old single lady, Miray struggles to develop her living. She works as a police officer with a limited monthly salary, and at the same time runs her own grocery store which she established in 2013, with five years of experience in this domain.

Miray is a well-known lady in her region with a good reputation, and works hard to develop her living. She is the sole earner of her family, where she is responsible for the living of another member of her family. An ambitious lady who puts great effort into developing both her living and business, she would like additional external financial support to increase and diversify her business merchandise. For this reason she felt Kiva's partner Al Majmoua was her best choice.

Her loan will be invested in increasing her business merchandise with special offer products with encouraging prices, especially for the coming autumn and winter seasons. She learned this business from her aunt, and she is working hard to develop it and turn it into a wider supermarket in the future.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with special offer products with encouraging prices, especially for the coming autumn and winter seasons

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo is a married mother of five, all of which attend school. She owns a house that does not have electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Mwanakombo has operated a retail shop business for the past three years, selling household consumables like wheat flour and maize flour from her home to her neighbours. She faces a challenge of delayed payments by creditors in her business. She dreams of expanding to a wholesale shop in the future.

With the KES 50,000 she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and cooking fat oil. She decided to join Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, and cooking fat oil.

loans.name: Fanny Estrella

texts.es:
En la parroquia crucita del cantón Portoviejo, se reúnen las socias del Grupo de Crédito Amigas Solidarias, esta localidad se la conoce por sus hermosas playas que rodean este lindo lugar y que son muy visitadas por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, se la conoce con el nombre de  “Crucita la Bella”.
En este lugar vive la señora Fanny, tiene 54 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció pero de esta relación tienen cinco hijos mayores de edad e independientes, aunque viven cerca de su casa.
Doña Fanny es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta trabajar para salir adelante sin depender de nadie, ella se dedica al comercio, vende ropa y zapatillas, también compra pinchagua (pescado) las curte y vende en Portoviejo lugar en el cual tiene muchos clientes, ella también elabora carteras hechas en lana, las mismas que vende a clientes en particular o entrega a ciertos comerciantes que luego las venden en otros lugares, ella de alguna u otra forma busca la manera de ganarse la vida y no depender de nadie ya que esta sola. 
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar ropa, zapatillas, pinchagua y material para elaborar las carteras. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo de Crédito. Sus sueños es seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The Amigas Solidarias lending group meets every two weeks in the Crucita Parrish, area of the Portoviejo settlement.  This area is known for the beautiful beaches that surround this beautiful place and are well visited by local and international tourists.  It’s known as “Crucita la Bella.”

Fanny lives here.  She is 54 years old and her husband passed away several years ago, but they had five children together who are now adults and on their own and live nearby.  Fanny is a hardworking woman who likes to work and sells clothing and shoes.  She also buys fish and sells in Portoviejo where she has many customers.  She also makes wallets out of wool and sells them to customers or delivers them to merchants who sell them in other areas.  She always looks for ways to earn a living one way or another without depending on anyone else.

She will use the money from this loan to buy clothing, shoes, and supplies to make more wallets.  She has been with this group since the beginning.  Her dream is to move ahead.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.en:
Arturo is 64 years old and married with two children.

Arturo works hard to provide for his family. He runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional groceries to sell at his general store.

Arturo has borrowed and repaid 10 loans from NWTF before this loan. He has been running the general store for 2 years and also earns an income from electronic mobile load retailing.

Arturo aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for his family.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell at his general store.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.en:
Hello! Meet Silvia who is 33 years old from Chuka, a remote rural town in the central area of Kenya. This is a region with good weather patterns that favor crop and animal farming. She resides with her husband and they are blessed with two beautiful children. 

Silvia has been actively involved in mixed farming for the past 10 years and she sells milk, eggs, and various varieties of food crops at a local market and to her neighbors. She passionately loves poultry farming. The biggest challenge she is currently facing is the lack of quality breeds of poultry that are disease-resistant and grow well. To solve this problem she is kindly seeking a loan from Kiva lenders via Juhudi Kilimo to purchase additional poultry that grow well. Having additional poultry will provide her with practical benefits, since she will be able to increase her egg productivity and also sell good quality poultry meat. Through the loan she will increase her profit margins and this will translate to better living conditions for her family. Silvia believes that through proper feeding of her poultry with high quality feed, they will grow even better. Other than profits from poultry she will benefit from chicken manure which contains the highest amount of nitrogen compared to other livestock manure. 

Silvia is comfortable with the repayment period and monthly instalments, and promises to make payments all throughout the repayment cycle.

loans.use: To buy better breeds of chickens for her farm

loans.name: Isabel Teonila

texts.es: Isabel de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia vende una variedad de productos y tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor como golosinas, pan dulce, refrescos, granos básicos, sopas, azúcar, etc. ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así podrá tener mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Isabel is 51 years old and lives in a home of her own with her family.  She has a small store in her home where she sells a variety of products and has many customers because of her good prices.  She is asking for this loan to buy candy, sweet bread, soft drinks, basic grains, soups, sugar, etc. since this is her only source of employment and this will provide her with a better income and quality of life.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Marlene Elisabeth

texts.es: Marlena de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijas, ella se dedica a la venta de ajo de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, tiene muchos clientes ya establecidos por los buenos precios, ella esta solicitando a INTEGRAL  un crédito para la compra de mas ajos por mayor para seguir con sus ventas que le generan buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Marlena is 34 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband and two daughters.  She sells garlic on foot at the various markets near her home and has many steady customers because of her good prices.  She is asking for this loan through INTEGRAL to buy more garlic in quantity so she can continue her sales that generate a good income.

loans.use: to buy garlic.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.en:
Honey Valerie is 40 years old and is the first of two children in her family. Her mother Leonor is a member of NWTF, and supports the family through her business selling food supplements and herbal products in the Philippines.

Honey Valerie is studying toward a Bachelor of Science degree in architecture and is currently in the first year of this five-year course. Leonor is borrowing 18,000 PHP to pay for the tuition fees of her daughter Honey Valerie for the second semester of the 2014-2015 school year.

Honey Valerie plans to graduate and become gainfully employed.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's tuition fees

loans.name: Ana Julia  De Jesus

texts.es: Ana de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la confección de ropa desde hace 10 años, su taller de costura lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza la ropa, Ana esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos, agujas, variedad de tela, botones, elásticos, etc. y asi poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Ana is 52 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband.  She has been making clothing for 10 years and has a workshop in her home.  She has many customers because of the quality of the clothing she makes.  Ana is asking for this loan to buy thread, needles, fabrics, buttons, elastic, etc. so she can continue the work that provides her with a good income.

loans.use: to buy thread, needles, a variety of fabrics, buttons, elastic, etc.

loans.name: Ana Vilma

texts.es: Ana de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica desde hace 12 años a la elaboración y venta de pupusas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz, chicharrón, quesillo, frijoles, harina de arroz, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana is 55 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband.  She has been making and selling pupusas for 12 years and has many customers.  She is asking for a loan to buy dried corn, pork rinds, cheese, beans, rice flour, etc. so she can continue her work so she can have a better income and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Henry Alexander

texts.es: Henry de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el posee una venta de maletines y bolsones tiene de diferentes estilos y para todas las personas, los productos que comercia es de muy buena calidad y los vende a precios accesibles es por eso que se ha hecho de mucha clientela, el solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar mas productos por mayor para continuar con su trabajo y obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Henry is 41 years old and lives in a home of his own with his wife.  He sells briefcases and bags of different styles for all people.  He sells quality products at affordable prices so he has many customers.  He is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL to buy products in quantity so he can continue his work and obtain a better income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to maintain his cocoa crops.

loans.name: Virgilia

texts.en:
Virgilia is 51 years old and married with one child. With one child still in school, Virgilia works very hard to provide for them.

Virgilia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like eggs, beer, shampoo, noodles, cereal, canned goods, coffee, etc. to sell.

Virgilia has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items such as eggs, beer, shampoo, noodles, cereal, canned goods, coffee, etc. 

Virgilia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like eggs, beer, shampoo, noodles, cereal, canned goods, coffee, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Verónica Magdalena

texts.es:
Verónica de 41 años de edad,  estudio hasta bachillerato.  Es madre soltera de 5 hijos. Verónica  es empleada desde hace 6 años.

Ella se dedica al comercio de flores artificiales y también al comercio de lácteos, el negocio lo tiene en el mercado.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar flores para la época de noviembre y también para invertir en productos lácteos.

Desea que se le otorgue el crédito y poder invertir en sus flores y venderlas en la época y así tener mas ingresos.
texts.en:
Verónica, age 41, studied up through high school.  She is a single mother of 5 children.  Veronica has been employed for 6 years.

She works selling artificial flowers as well as selling dairy products.  She has her business in the market.

The loan she is requesting is to buy flowers for the November season, as well as to invest in dairy products.

She would like to be granted the loan and to be able to invest in her flowers and sell them during the season, thereby making more income.

loans.use: to buy flowers for the November season and to invest in dairy products.

loans.name: Ismael Ovidio

texts.es: Ismael de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el trabaja como albañil y también se dedica al cultivo de maíz, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra salir adelante con los gastos de la casa, el quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro en la parte de enfrente de la casa y colocando el piso donde muestra la fotografía, pero no tiene de suficiente de capital por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de ladrillos, arenas, cemento, hierro, etc. y así el y su familia puedan vivir más seguros y cómodos.
texts.en: Ismael is 33 years old and lives with her family in a home of his own.  He works as a mason and also raises corn.  He supports his family with his income and wants to improve his home by building a wall in front and installing a floor where is shown in the image.  He doesn’t have enough capital so he is asking for this loan to buy bricks, sand, cement, iron bars, etc.  This will allow him and his family to live more comfortably and securely.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy print-screening inks and supplies such as shirts, key chains, pens, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to replace her roof.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es: Rosa de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante con los gastos de la casa, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro perimetral donde muestra la fotografía, pero no tiene de suficiente de capital por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de ladrillos, arenas, cemento, hierro y pago de mano de obra y asi puedan vivir más seguros y cómodos.
texts.en: Rosa is 36 years old and lives in a home of her own with her life’s partner.  She sells tortillas and pays the household expenses with her income.  She wants to make improvements to her home and build a wall in the area in the image, but she doesn’t have enough capital, so she is requesting a loan to buy brick, sand, cement, iron bars, and pay for labor so they can live more comfortably and securely.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plants, mulch, fertilizer, flowerpots, etc.

loans.name: Roberina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Robertina de 35 años de edad,  estudio hasta 9ª grado.  Se encuentra acompañada su pareja se dedica a la mecánica automotriz;  tiene 4 hijos.

Ella administra una pequeña tienda desde hace 5 años, ya que su mamá falleció y le dejo la tienda a ella; también se dedica a vender productos de belleza, la tienda la administra ella y una hija.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar arroz, frijoles, maíz, golosinas, detergentes, aceite, etc. 

Su deseo es que su tienda crezca y que tenga mas ingresos para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Robertina, age 35, studied until the 9th grade. She has a life partner who works as a mechanic. She has 4 children. 

She has taken care of a small store for the last 5 years. It was her mother’s store, but she left it to her when she passed away. She also sales beauty products. The store is managed by her and a daughter.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy rice, beans, corn, candies, deterngetn, oil, etc.

Her wish is to make her store grow and have more incomes for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, corn, candies, detergent, oil, etc.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Maria de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella posee una pequeña tienda desde hace 2 años ubicada en su lugar de residencia vende una variedad de productos como golosinas, refrescos, granos básicos, café, sopas, huevos, gelatinas, azúcar, etc. y tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así podrá tener mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 31 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and three children. She has had a small store in her house for more than 2 years. She sells a variety of products, such as sweets, soft drinks, basic grains, coffee, soups, eggs, gelatins, sugar, etc. She has many customers because of her good prices. She is requesting the loan to buy more merchandise at wholesale price, since this is her only source of income and in this way she can have improved profits, and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sweets, soft drinks, basic grains, coffee, soups, eggs, gelatins, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Yanet Carolina

texts.es: Yanet de 42 años de edad vive sola en casa propia, ella se dedica a la elaboración de antojitos como: papas fritas, yuca frita, empanadas, tamales, etc. que vende de forma ambulante cerca de su lugar de residencia, gracias a las ventas que realiza ha logrado solventar los gastos de su hogar. Ella solicita un crédito para la compra de productos que utiliza en la elaboración de sus antojitos como: aceite, papas, maíz para los tamales, plátanos y todo los ingredientes para su elaboración y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Yanet is 42 years old and lives in her own house. She makes snacks such as: french fries, empanadas, tamales, etc., which she sellls as a street vendor near hear house. Thanks to the sales she makes, she has been able to cover her household's expenses. She is requesting a loan to buy products that she uses to make her snacks, such as: cooking oil, potatoes, corn for the tamales, plantains, and all of the ingredients for making her foods, so that she can have improved income.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, potatoes, corn for the tamales, plantains, and all of the ingredients that she needs.

loans.name: Maria  Angela

texts.es: Maria de 43 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para damas y caballeros, desde hace 5 años ejerce este oficio y cuenta con muchos clientes fijos con lo que puede mantener su negocio a flote, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella vive con su compañero de vida  y esta solicita un crédito para comprar mayor cantidad de ropa interior diferentes precios, estilos y colores y de esta forma contar con más clientes y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria, age 43, sells women’s and men’s underwear.  She has been working in this trade for 5 years, and she has many regular customers with whom she can keep her business afloat.  With the profits she gets from her sales, she has been able to cover some of her household expenses.  She lives with her life partner, and she is requesting a loan to buy a greater quantity of underwear of different prices, styles, and colors.  That way, she can have more customers and thus improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of underwear in different prices, styles, and colors.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.es:
La necesidad de  seguir adelante en la vida ha llevado a Catarina  de 29 años de edad soltera a aprender algunos oficios.  A través de los años se ha dedicado a la compra y venta de abarrotería, ella tiene la visión de superar cada día en su negocio para que le genere más ganancias para el beneficio de su familia ella tiene dos hijos  los cuales son estudiantes de la escuela de su comunidad. 

La actividad que ella realiza es la compra y venta de abarrotería en la comunidad, ella  tomo esa iniciativa de vender productos de abarrotería porque ya tiene 10 años de experiencia en dicho campo laboral y sabe que deja muy buena ganancia para ella y su familia para mejorar las condiciones de vida. 

El uso respectivo que le dará el crédito es para la compra de mercadería de abarrotaría para poder disponer a su clientela la variedad de productos con que ella cuenta ya que ella es una mujer con visiones hacia el futuro, piensa en el futuro de sus hijos para mejorar las condiciones de vida de ella y su comunidad. 

Con las ganancias que obtengan de su negocio sus metas personales en los próximos años es comprar más locales en el centro de su comunidad para expandir su negocio y brindarles educación a sus hijos para que ellos sean profesionales en la vida.
texts.en:
The need of getting ahead has forced Catarina, a 29-year-old single woman, to learn different crafts. Through the years she has bought and sold groceries. She has the vision of improving her business day by day in order to create more profits for the well-being of her family. She has two children who attend to the local school. 

She works selling and buying groceries in her community. She took the initiative of doing this activity because she has over 10 years of experience in this job and knows that she can get a good profit from it, and thus improve her family’s living conditions. 

She will use the loan to buy groceries in order to offer her clients a wide variety of products. She thinks about her children’s future, and wants to improve theirs and their community’s quality of life.

Her personal goal for the next years is to buy more stores in the downtown of her community with the profits that she gets from her current business. With this she wants to expand her business and give her children an education in order to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: Alejandro 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus cinco hijos, desde hace varios años se dedica a la crianza de ganado de engorde en la zona donde reside, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad del producto, Alejandro esta  solicitado un crédito para poder comprar más ganado de engorde que le permita crecer en el negocio y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Alejandro, age 53, lives in his own house along with his life partner and his five children. For several years he has worked in livestock rearing in the area where he lives. He has a lot of customers due to the quality of his products. 

Alejandro is requesting this loan to buy more fattening cattle. This will allow him to make his business grow and improve his incomes.

loans.use: to buy more fattening cattle.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn, 45, engages in a food-vending business. She makes and sells native bread. She has been engaged in this kind of business for three years now. 

She and her husband have six children. Her oldest child is 26, and the youngest is 10. Her husband's occupation is a laborer. 

She needs capital to finance her livelihood, so Marilyn  has requested a loan  of 20,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to buy  additional ingredients like a sack  of flour, leavening agent, sugar and materials like mixing bowls and baking pans. The additional stock and tools would help her produce and sell more bread. She could cater to a huge number of customers and would definitely create higher earnings.

Marilyn hopes to have a stable income that would help her send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients like a sack of flour, leavening agent, sugar and materials like  mixing bowls and baking pans

loans.name: Sadokat

texts.en:
Sadokat is a kind woman, single, and without children. She has a secondary education, and she has been involved in agriculture since 2009. She currently owns two cows and four head of sheep. Her parents are happy to help her run the farming business. 

Sadokat has everything she needs to keep livestock at home, and she already gathered feed for the winter. She is asking for a loan of 6,000 Somoni to buy coal for the winter season. She awaits your mercy and really needs your support.

loans.use: to buy coal for the winter season

loans.name: Ailene

texts.en:
Ailene is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Ailene is 33 years old, and two children are currently in school.

Ailene has a fishing business in the Philippines. Ailene requested a 14,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials and gasoline for her business.

Ailene has been in this business for six years. In the future, Ailene would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials and gasoline for her business

loans.name: Edina

texts.en:
Edina is 53 years old and married with five children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Edina has borrowed and paid back five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from fish vending.

Edina aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Primavera Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Primavera está en su ciclo número 1, es un grupo formado en la ciudad de Curuguaty, una zona alejada y aun en crecimiento, es eminentemente rural, donde todas las integrantes luchan por salir adelante.
La Sra. Eva es  la tesorera  del comité, ella se dedica a la elaboración de kit de limpieza y también es modista  Desea que conforme pase el tiempo, y por medio de su esfuerzo pueda ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos, dándoles una vida digna.
Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de mas producto de limpieza para la venta y de hilos y telas y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo  y dar así a su familia lo que necesitan para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The group named "Primavera" (Spring) is in its first loan cycle. This group was formed in the city of Curuguaty, a remote area that is still growing and is mostly rural. All of the members are striving to get ahead.

Sra. Eva is the treasurer of the committee. She makes cleaning kits and also works as a clothing designer. Eva wants to spend her time by making the effort to help her family and loved ones so that she can provide them a decent life.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy more cleaning products to sell, as well as thread and fabrics, so that she can keep growing. As a result, Eva can give her family what they need to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more cleaning products to sell, as well as thread and fabrics for sewing.

loans.name: Wanawangurumo Group

texts.en:
Nuru is in her late 20s and is the mother of one boy who is still young. She always works hard and has a plan to meet her dream of managing a shop selling phones. For a period of four years now, she has run a shop selling phone accessories and electronics items like extensions, tube lights, wires, sockets, etc. Nuru works from 6am to 8pm per working day and is able to make a good profit each month.

From Tujijenge Tanzania, this is more than her first credit cycle. She has managed to repay all of her previous loans successfully. Nuru used the previous credits to buy more shop accessories which she sold to more people. She earned an extra income which she used to cover part of her home food expenses. In the coming years now, Nuru would like to be successful. She will invest her portion of the loan to restock her shop with accessories and electronic goods to resell.

Nuru will share this loan with her group "Wanawangurumo" which consists of six people who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock her shop with accessories and electronic goods to resell.

loans.name: Silvia Yaneth

texts.es: Silvia vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de medicina natural desde hace 2 años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes por la calidad del producto, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas medicina natural por mayor y así poder continuar con sus ventas que le generan buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Silvia lives in her own home along with her husband and child. She has been selling natural medicines for two years. Her business is located near her home and she has many customers because of the quality of her products.

Silvia is requesting a loan so that she can buy more natural medicines in bulk. As a result, she can continue her sales and generate a good income.

loans.use: to buy natural medicines in bulk.

loans.name: Las Amistosas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco

La socia es la Sra.
